documents.document: @SkyHelpTeam I saw that. Glad an agreement has been reached.
@kevebbs definitely. I lost my mind when I saw the cask type. Still pretty strong mind you. Definitely knock you out if you have too many
@bvanmelkebeke good job I wear things like that once in a blue moon. Usually prefer my feet flat
@kevebbs good choice. Forgot to try the 73 I think. The Grain is such an ever changing dram. Loved it!
@bvanmelkebeke no and probably not the ones to wear on a cold damp day in town walking over cobbles 🙈
@bvanmelkebeke probably 😂 although I did manage in 4 inch heels yesterday with not too much pain 👍🏻
@ocdwhisky @Bunnahabhain indeed it's not. Wouldn't have cried if I had purchased then tried as it would be good for the spring.
Honestly this place is already amazing value. If you're looking for a midweek treat, can't recommend this highly en… https://t.co/mdwVayqF3S
@bvanmelkebeke could do it heels I suppose lol 😂😂
@thisismydram well maybe too early, cause if I do get another plan I'll need to probably drive. Suspect someone is telling me to think again
Maybe one to try later on 👍🏻 https://t.co/gPPHyw65mn
@bvanmelkebeke this is true! Shame I'll not be wearing them as I'll be expected to run about after him all day 😝
@ocdwhisky @Bunnahabhain some are just like that. For me it's usually a Sherry one that blows my mind and I don't really do the sherry casks
@ocdwhisky @Bunnahabhain indeed, £62.80 a bottle. Excellent for the price
@Swaledalebothy with a smws membership you save on the bottles vs non member and you get excellent quality & age at an excellent price.
@Swaledalebothy and you meet really great people and the bottlings are fab. Independent bottlers really do offer great value for money &
@Swaledalebothy I would say yes. I get a lot out of it and used to enjoy their events for members, however there is less in my local smws
Great, he's decided he doesn't feel well so my plans for today are now in tatters. This really sucks 😞
@ocdwhisky @Bunnahabhain reminded me of sherbet strawberry sweeties. You would probably like it 👍🏻
@ocdwhisky @Bunnahabhain that I do. I've learnt with whisky to expect the unexpected 👍🏻
@ocdwhisky @spikeydog120 got to try it to know if you like it or not. Had it served at a coffee tasting once, nobody apart from me ate it
@spikeydog120 seasoned seaweed is really nice. Some people are like 🤢others really like it.
@ocdwhisky @Bunnahabhain if that's your sort of thing 😂😂 just not what I wanted or expected. Lots of Sherry casks too
@Andrews_Share @SMWSUK unfortunately not, but that information should be able to be given as all casks can be traced.
@spikeydog120 it's really good. Took it with me for the Bunnahabhain but it wasn't the right dram for it.
@ChrisWhiskyman the whisky. Well not crap I mean it was nice but not what I was looking for
@Andrews_Share @SMWSUK they do put cask finishes on them but sometimes I do think some have been finished and not advised
@ChrisWhiskyman 😂😂😂 good job it's crap lol
@KindaDouglas @Bunnahabhain this one is very unpeated and pretty floral to me. Definitely a perfect lighter dram say for a spring/summer day
Cragganmore and spicy seaweed is an amazing combo 👍🏻 https://t.co/Hf1YI8PXtj
This is defo a buyer! Amazing long slightly smoked paprika finish. Red wine cragganmore 👍🏻🥃 https://t.co/K6gtgmk7FU
New bottle label design but not the full change yet. Hmmmm not sure about this @Bunnahabhain it's not smokey at all… https://t.co/4WybLUXAKA
They'd know it was me if I borrowed these 😂😂 https://t.co/YLPCJ2Buy8
@ocdwhisky @Jotterface I have done in the past 😂😂😂😂👍🏻
@ocdwhisky @Bunnahabhain I will indeed. Might be another bottle to add to the ever growing collection. Actually might need two!
@Jotterface @ocdwhisky with lots of cobbles and they are of no use unless I want to get they ruined so I just look at them 😂😂
@Jotterface @ocdwhisky and good quality shoes last....especially with me as I tend to look at them and then realise I live in a cold place
@Jotterface @ocdwhisky 😂😂what are you two like? Those shoes could pass for brand new on eBay...I've seen a lot worse being passed off as new
@ocdwhisky yup! It will be. New @Bunnahabhain which I want to try with my spicy seaweed 😋been carrying it about since Monday
@ocdwhisky 😂😂😂 I didn't buy them.....technically I did but I didn't cause he gave me the money for them...they are a present 🙈
@WhiskyApocalyps is the only way. Wonder how many people protesting had American products on their person last night?
@WhiskyApocalyps it is but looking at it apart from shares there is nothing directly owed by the organisation I know of/use/buy. But boycott
@steveprentice @SkyHelpTeam @DiscoveryUK guess I'll be pulling my @NOWTV if Discovery isn't there. That's what I've got it for
@WhiskyApocalyps stuff. Stop their income, reduce revenue and it will force change due to even more unrest.
@WhiskyApocalyps doesn't seem to have anything directly owned that I would be involved with but I think people will need to stop buying US
Proper competitive football this evening. The FA cup is good but quite clear some teams are more focused on the leagues than cups.
@XFlasks fabby! Thank you 🤗
Ooft glad this is in London otherwise Edinburgh city centre would be even more unbearable lol https://t.co/II2gKan2fE
Didn't manage to get to the cinema but I did manage to get to 28 Queen Street but the preview bottles aren't available yet 😩have to go back😜
@bvanmelkebeke ha ha 😂😂 biggest size I could get......but yes like a proper number 👍🏻
I'm being a good girl.......I promise......well I was until I stopped by @pamjenkinsshoes 😂😂 https://t.co/ausjNrOFLK
@spikeydog120 well a wee bit retail therapy has helped. Nice new pair of boots 😂😂
Just when I feel I'm making progress, I get knocked right back to almost the start 😞
@WhiskyApocalyps will you be modelling the bag once your mending is done?
@jaydos @SMWSQueenStreet well thanks to a planned march this evening I'll be unable to do my usual routine so Whisky will do instead 🙈👍🏻🥃
@whiskyrepublic @SMWSQueenStreet oh it is. Popped I yesterday but they didn't have what I was after so needs must and all that 👍🏻
Plans for today, might try and catch T2 and then head to @SMWSQueenStreet in the hope they've got some preview outturn bottles 👍🏻🥃
@dram_gazette @spikeydog120 @JasonVaswani @GKaleniecki @Maltman_Mike @GentlemanGrimm @ocdwhisky @Aescarion @iheartwhisky Have a good one 👍🏻🥃
@ocdwhisky @RealDramTom @SMWSUK lots and lots of them to try for me....keep trying not to be pulled back into my favourites
@ocdwhisky @RealDramTom clearly side by side and not in the same glass 😝
@ocdwhisky @Jotterface worried I couldn't drink but was still doing it lol! 😜 but thank you 😊
@kevebbs I've only had two......should have taken the hospital up on their offer of something stronger
@GKaleniecki @Jotterface no, nothing serious. Just taking longer than I thought
@kevebbs trying my best to numb the pain......it's not working
@RealDramTom @ocdwhisky I've never been a huge Sherry cask fan but Sherry finishes are just wonderful, especially Oloroso casks
@RealDramTom I would have too. Looks fab
@RealDramTom hmmm that's a tough one re what to open first 😋🥃
@ChrisWhiskyman thanks. Arms still very sore today. Trying to numb the pain with booze 😉
@Jotterface thanks.....it's gonna take a while but at least I can still drink 👍🏻
Feeling sleepy, no wonder after Amaretto, Isle of Harris Gin with blood orange and lime, Rioja, a Laphroaig and co-codamol 😴😴
@Jotterface your veins do I believe. The doctor said do you want a plaster as I was staring at what resembled a golf ball under my skin 😳
@ocdwhisky @spikeydog120 @TheDramShopUK at least I can admit it without force 😜
@spikeydog120 @ocdwhisky @TheDramShopUK I feel I can't say anything......I seem to have a similar issue myself
@ocdwhisky @spikeydog120 @TheDramShopUK that's exactly what I thought.....can't wait to get a drink now 😂😂😂😂🥃🥃
@spikeydog120 @ocdwhisky @TheDramShopUK are we talking a little being could sink a ship? 😂😂😂
@ocdwhisky @spikeydog120 @TheDramShopUK I see. Must have been hacked a fair few times 🙈😂
@ocdwhisky @spikeydog120 @TheDramShopUK must be someone else posting pictures on your account 😂
@spikeydog120 @TheDramShopUK that'll be hard but I hear that your partner in crime @ocdwhisky has a bottle....surely he'll break first?
@mattveira @WhiskyExchange bet that's a little beauty
@spikeydog120 @TheDramShopUK ooft! Look at the colour of that! Looks amazing
@rashiimpex I'm partial to @MichtersWhiskey @BuffaloTraceUK @eaglerarelife @BalconesWhisky @RebelYell_UK to name a few
@ChrisWhiskyman indeed it was. And I really needed it too.
Lying in my bed.....first lie in for ages. My neighbour is playing crowded house on his guitar. It's actually quite soothing
@KindaDouglas @Arranwhisky mmmm 9yr old one? They are just at their perfect sweet spot at that age 🤗
@winterchris2010 that's the lack of hard booze!!
@winterchris2010 nah. Couldn't do that.....says she who gave up drinking for 3 years at 20 yrs old
@KindaDouglas @Arranwhisky oooh nice. Which one? I've been indulging in a few of them recently
@kizzsmyth @Arranwhisky well they are the only official drink of the man himself 👍🏻
@KindaDouglas @Arranwhisky wow! And a school night too. I like your style 👍🏻🥃
I hope you're all having a dram or three for Burns Night 👍🏻 I've started with a cheeky wee @Arranwhisky Robert Burns #Whisky
@LakesMashman @MagnumcreamUK it certainly is and yup the guys and gal of Magnum are epic!
No milk or cream for my coffee, so @MagnumcreamUK it will have to suffice. As if it was a difficult choice 😂
Enjoying a longmorn in my favourite whisky glass from @CumbriaCrystal named after my favourite place in the lakes t… https://t.co/IbyxRmTsfp
@Whi5kyGeek @GlenfiddichSMW that's a 'healthy' way to get your whisky allowance
@CumbriaCrystal congratulations 🍾very well deserved
I had my bloods taken for the umpteenth time today. 1 was to confirm my blood group but nobody has ever confirmed what it is & I still dunno
@WhiskyApocalyps @hifi_corner Yamaha YSP-5600 and a Bowers & Wilkins sub. Think the ASW608
@Admflet @DiplomaticoRum are represented by @SpecialityBrand in the U.K. & there are a few guys up here you should be able to speak with 👍🏻
Thanks to @hifi_corner for our new Soundbar and sub.....I can now drown out my neighbours 'band practice' with deep bass notes all evening👍🏻
@hifi_corner I would say it's the Technics SL-1200 I was eyeing up the other week.
